Docs.summary: Provides a structure for reading information about an exception that occurs in a mobile application. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is internal and used by the adaptive error handling mechanism to encapsulate exception information.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

Docs.summary: The key to retrieve current exception information from the . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ErrorFormatterPage> to retrieve information for a <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo> object.

Docs.summary: Returns a description of the exception. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

Returns the name of the code file where the exception occurred. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: The name of the code file where the exception occurred.

Docs.summary: Returns a string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: A string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key.

Docs.summary: Returns the line number in the code where the exception occurred, if tracing is enabled. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: The line number in the code where the exception occurred.

Docs.value: An alternate text for the exception.

Docs.summary: Returns an alternate title for the exception. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
